original: Accessibility Menu. Use up and down arrows to navigate, and enter to activate buttons and bars.
translation: 无障碍菜单。使用向上和向下箭头导航，并使用Enter键以激活按钮和条目。

original: Self-voicing support is limited when using a touch screen.
translation: 使用触摸屏时，自朗诵功能的支持是有限的。

original: The options on this menu are intended to improve accessibility. They may not work with all games, and some combinations of options may render the game unplayable. This is not an issue with the game or engine. For the best results when changing fonts, try to keep the text size the same as it originally was.
translation: 此菜单上的选项旨在提高易用性。它们可能并不适用于所有游戏，某些选项组合可能会导致游戏无法正常游玩。这不是游戏或引擎的问题。为了在更改字体时获得最佳效果，请尽量保持文本大小与原始大小相同。

original: The interactive director is not enabled here.
translation: The interactive director is not enabled here.

original: Click to toggle attribute, right click to toggle negative attribute.
translation: Click to toggle attribute, right click to toggle negative attribute.

original: Click to set transform, right click to add to transform list.
translation: Click to set transform, right click to add to transform list.

original: Customize director.transforms to add more transforms.
translation: Customize director.transforms to add more transforms.

original: Click to set, right click to add to behind list.
translation: Click to set, right click to add to behind list.

original: Customize director.transitions to add more transitions.
translation: Customize director.transitions to add more transitions.

original: Customize director.audio_channels to add more channels.
translation: Customize director.audio_channels to add more channels.

original: Are you sure you want to delete this save?
translation: 您确定要删除此存档吗?

original: Are you sure you want to overwrite your save?
translation: 您确定要覆盖您的存档吗?

original: Loading will lose unsaved progress.\nAre you sure you want to do this?
translation: 加载存档将丢失未保存的进度。\n你确定要这么做吗?

original: Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to return to the main menu?\nThis will lose unsaved progress.
translation: 您确定要返回主菜单吗?\n这将丢失未保存的进度。

original: Are you sure you want to continue where you left off?
translation: 你确定要从你离开的地方继续吗?

original: Are you sure you want to end the replay?
Are you sure you want to begin skipping?
Are you sure you want to skip to the next choice?
translation: 你确定要跳到下一个选择吗?

original: Are you sure you want to skip unseen dialogue to the next choice?
translation: 你确定要跳过没看过的对话跳到下一个选择吗?

original: This save was created on a different device. Maliciously constructed save files can harm your computer. Do you trust this save's creator and everyone who could have changed the file?
translation: 这个存档是在另一个设备上创建的。恶意构建的存档文件可能会损害您的计算机。您信任这个存档的创建者和所有可能更改文件的人吗?

original: Do you trust the device the save was created on? You should only choose yes if you are the device's sole user.
translation: 您信任创建存档的设备吗?只有当你是该设备的唯一用户时，你才应该选择yes。

original: This program contains free software under a number of licenses, including the MIT License and GNU Lesser General Public License. A complete list of software, including links to full source code, can be found {a=https://www.renpy.org/l/license}here{/a}.
translation: 本程序包含许多许可证下的开源软件，包括MIT许可证和GNU较宽松通用公共许可证。完整的软件列表，包括完整源代码的链接，可以在{A =https://www.renpy.org/l/license}这里{/ A}找到。

original: Clipboard voicing enabled. Press 'shift+C' to disable.
translation: 启用朗诵剪贴板。按 “shift+C ”可禁用。

original: Self-voicing would say \"[renpy.display.tts.last]\". Press 'alt+shift+V' to disable.
translation: 自朗诵功能将会读出 \"[renpy.display.tts.last]\". 按 'alt+shift+V' 可禁用.
自朗诵功能启用. 按 'v' 可禁用.

original: Could not connect to the Ren'Py Sync server.
translation: 无法连接到Ren'Py同步服务器。

original: The Ren'Py Sync server timed out.
An unknown error occurred while connecting to the Ren'Py Sync server.
translation: 在连接到Ren'Py Sync服务器时发生未知错误。

original: The Ren'Py Sync server does not have a copy of this sync. The sync ID may be invalid, or it may have timed out.
translation: Ren'Py Sync服务器没有此同步数据副本。同步ID可能无效，或者已超时。

original: Please enter the sync ID you generated.\nNever enter a sync ID you didn't create yourself.
translation: 请输入您生成的同步ID。\n永远不要输入不是你自己创建的同步ID。

original: The sync ID is not in the correct format.
The sync could not be decrypted.
The sync belongs to a different game.
translation: 同步数据属于另一个游戏。

original: The sync contains a file with an invalid name.
translation: 同步数据包含一个名称无效的文件。

original: This will upload your saves to the {a=https://sync.renpy.org}Ren'Py Sync Server{/a}.\nDo you want to continue?
translation: 这将上传您的保存到{a=https://sync.renpy.org}Ren'Py同步服务器{/a}。\n你想继续吗?

original: This will contact the {a=https://sync.renpy.org}Ren'Py Sync Server{/a}.
You can use this ID to download your save on another device.\nThis sync will expire in an hour.\nRen'Py Sync is supported by {a=https://www.renpy.org/sponsors.html}Ren'Py's Sponsors{/a}.
translation: 您可以使用此ID在另一台设备上下载您的存档。\n此同步数据将在一小时后失效。\nRen'Py同步由{a=https://www.renpy.org/sponsors.html}Ren'Py的赞助商{/a}支持。

original: File list digest does not match.
Either this project does not support updating, or the update status file was deleted.
translation: 此项目不支持更新，或者更新状态文件已被删除。

original: This account does not have permission to perform an update.
translation: 此帐户没有执行更新的权限。

original: This account does not have permission to write the update log.
translation: 此帐户没有写入更新日志的权限。

original: The update file was not downloaded.
The update file does not have the correct digest - it may have been corrupted.
translation: 更新文件没有正确的摘要-它可能已经损坏。

original: This program is up to date.
[u.version] is available. Do you want to install it?
The updates have been installed. The program will restart.
translation: 已安装更新。程序将重新启动。

original: Preparing to download the game data.
The game data has been downloaded.
An error occured when trying to download game data:
translation: 下载游戏数据时出现错误:

original: This game cannot be run until the game data has been downloaded.
translation: 在下载游戏数据之前，此游戏无法运行。

original: Changes will take effect the next time this program is run.
translation: 更改将在下次运行此程序时生效。

original: This computer is using software rendering.
translation: 这台计算机正在使用CPU渲染。

original: This game requires use of GL2 that can't be initialised.
translation: 这个游戏依赖的GL2不能初始化。

original: This computer has a problem displaying graphics: [problem].
translation: 这台计算机图像显示遇到了问题：[problem].

original: Its graphics drivers may be out of date or not operating correctly. This can lead to slow or incorrect graphics display.
translation: 它的显卡驱动可能过时或不能正常运行。这可能导致缓慢或不正确的图形显示。

original: The {a=edit:1:log.txt}log.txt{/a} file may contain information to help you determine what is wrong with your computer.
translation: {a=edit:1:log.txt}log.txt{/a}文件可能包含能帮助您查明计算机出了什么问题的信息。

original: More details on how to fix this can be found in the {a=[url]}documentation{/a}.
translation: 关于如何解决这个问题的更多细节可以在{a=[url]}文档{/a}中找到。

original: Opens the traceback.txt file in a text editor.
translation: 在文本编辑器中打开traceback.txt文件。

original: Copies the traceback.txt file to the clipboard as BBcode for forums like https://lemmasoft.renai.us/.
translation: 将traceback.txt文件作为BBcode复制到剪贴板，用于https://lemmasoft.renai.us/等论坛。

original: Copies the traceback.txt file to the clipboard as Markdown for Discord.
translation: 将traceback.txt文件复制到剪贴板，作为Markdown 用于发布到Discord。

original: Attempts a roll back to a prior time, allowing you to save or choose a different choice.
translation: 尝试回滚到以前的时间，允许您保存或选择不同的选择。

original: Ignores the exception, allowing you to continue.
Ignores the exception, allowing you to continue. This often leads to additional errors.
translation: 忽略异常，允许您继续。这通常会导致额外的错误。

original: Reloads the game from disk, saving and restoring game state if possible.
translation: 从磁盘重新加载游戏，并尝试保存和恢复游戏状态。

original: Opens a console to allow debugging the problem.
translation: 打开控制台以允许调试问题。
